title: Flick Finder
description: A movie recommendation app, where a user can search for a movie by Title and/or Year of release to get related movies the user can watch. This was a team project where I contributed about 50% of the work in a team of 5.

title: Employee Info App
description: A calculator app built using HTML, CSS and Javascript. It is capable of carrying out all basic arithmetic operations.

title: Calculator
description: A calculator app built using HTML, CSS and Javascript. It is capable of carrying out all basic arithmetic operations.

title: Library
description: A library app which stores your books and displays their information on cards, built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Etch a Sketch
description: Etch-a-Sketch app, a mechanical drawing toy, built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Sign-up form
description: A sign-up form customized in vanilla CSS, built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Rock Paper Scissors game, playable against the AI, built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Portfolio Showcase
description: A portfolio of my web development work so far, showcasing apps I have put together.
